note.p: Death: His rooms in Trinity College, Cambridge (07 December 1928)
Education: St Paul's School; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA (1871), MA

Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge; Assistant Tutor and Examiner of Trinity College; Lecturer (1871-1901); editor of the 'Messenger of Mathematics' (1871-1928); Tutor, Trinity College (1883-1893)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1930 vol 126 pp i-xi, plate, signed by A R F
